subject: Soccer
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Manchester City beat Chelsea, 5-3, in a game that was cast as a friendly but took on intrigue with the news that City would join with the Yankees to buy an M.L.S. team.
snippet: Manchester City beat Chelsea, 5-3, in a game that was cast as a friendly but took on intrigue with the news that City would join with the Yankees to buy an M.L.S. team.
